member.name: T:PdfSharp.Diagnostics.NRT
member.summary: Helper class for code migration to nullable reference types.

member.name: M:PdfSharp.Diagnostics.NRT.ThrowOnNull(System.String)
member.summary: Throws an InvalidOperationException because an expression which must not be null is null.

member.name: M:PdfSharp.Diagnostics.NRT.ThrowOnNull``1(System.String)
member.summary: Throws InvalidOperationException. Use this function during the transition from older C# code to new code that uses nullable reference types.
member.typeparam: The type this function must return to be compiled correctly.
member.param: An optional message used for the exception.

member.name: M:PdfSharp.Diagnostics.NRT.ThrowOnNull``2(System.String)
member.summary: Throws InvalidOperationException. Use this function during the transition from older C# code to new code that uses nullable reference types.
member.typeparam: The type this function must return to be compiled correctly.
The type of the object that is null.
member.param: An optional message used for the exception.

member.name: T:PdfSharp.Logging.LogHost
member.summary: HACK to use logging without a hosted app.

member.name: P:PdfSharp.Logging.LogHost.Factory
member.summary: Gets or sets the logger factory for PDFsharp.

member.name: M:PdfSharp.Logging.LogHost.CreateLogger
member.summary: Creates a logger without a category.

member.name: M:PdfSharp.Logging.LogHost.CreateLogger``1
member.summary: Creates a logger with the full name of the given type as category.
